document_data.name: Qildor Rewen
document_data.mainbody: '''Qildor Rewen''' was an inhabitant of [[Cormanthyr]] in the 3{{rd}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Appearance: He was young and handsome, with a very eloquent stare.
document_data.Possessions: During a revel, he was seen with a silver-hilted sword.
document_data.History: He was a guest together with [[Aurae Shaeremae]] at a revel in {{yearlink|241}}, where [[Elminster Aumar]] substituted [[Eltargrim]]. There, he was rather blunt with the human Armathor, but appeared to come out of it with as good an impression as possible.
